CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 27, 1954, pg. 10 reads: "Admiring Gifts - Mrs. McKinley King and Mrs. L. R. Downing are admiring the gifts received by Mrs. M.R. Hadley at the swank formal dinner party given by Dr. Hadley in honor of his wife on their silver wedding anniversary. The event was held in Century Room of the Pittsburgher Hotel.  Almost thirty guests were among those attending the affair.  Cecil Patton (seated extreme left), brother of Mrs. Hadley, came from Chicago for the event.  - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Jessie Vann handing wrapped gift to Dr. and Mrs. M.R. Hadley during their 25th anniversary dinner, Century Room, Pittsburgher Hotel
